actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt from the definition of vessels non-self-propelled barges under certain conditions.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt certified non-self-propelled barges from the class of vessels which are subject to the duty on vessels equipped or repaired in a foreign country.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt from the definition of vessels non-self-propelled barges under certain conditions.
